Where can I find the virus scan results for the Verus software on different platforms?

The virus scan results for the Verus software can be found on VirusTotal:
* For MacOS: https://www.virustotal.com/#/file/a358156eaf210f594c214a309d6c201d0ccf9e7806065563b483a22e80dff791/detection
* For Linux: https://www.virustotal.com/#/file/e745633c99499a3cf968bc2f2c2d2fc56ecdc8d2996a2cf4fb43feff452acb71/detection
* For Windows: https://www.virustotal.com/#/file/2e3cbb2b9f38bccbf49061dce480d267c35f7d7ae5172fcda2c3a5afefd86736/detection
